txt.en: Cariad has suggested clearing craban spies from the wilderness north-east of the Cuan-lûth refuge.
DNT - Use the whistle to summon Cariad to your side
DNT - 'You deserve some of the truth now. Not here, of course -- it's too dangerous to discuss such matters out in the open. Return to the cave entrance and I'll tell you.'
DNT - Use the whistle to summon Cariad to your side

'I am Cariad. I'll spare you the details, but I've spotted numerous craban spies belonging to the White Hand in the wilderness north-east of here. Why don't you help me defeat a few of them? I promise I'll answer your questions afterwards.\n\n'Oh, I'm no fool -- I don't quite trust you yet. Consider it a wager.'

'Well done. You deserve some of the truth now: that campsite that you investigated was ours. My clan has avoided Saruman's spies thus far, but they know we must be close.\n\n'If the Rangers have also noticed our activity, then someone will find us eventually. I'd like for this to happen on my people's terms.'
DNT - You have defeated several of Saruman's crebain spies.\n\nCariad has something to tell you.
A Dunlending named Cariad has offered to work together, citing a common goal.
Cariad is waiting for you at the entrance of the Cuan-lûth refuge.\n\nYou should talk to him there.
